General.Name: Raydan Food Co
General.Description: Raydan Food Co. operates multifunctional restaurants. It offers meals serving and selling services. The company is also involved in managing, building, buying, developing, and selling real estate properties. In addition, it develops pastry shops for individuals; provides catering services; and offers export and import services related to restaurants. The company was formerly known as Raydan Co. Raydan Food Co. is headquartered in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia.
